---
title: "Shipboard UCTD System"
editor: visual
---

We have used several UCTD systems on NOAA Ships. The most recent system is the [Valeport rapidPro UCTD](https://www.valeport.co.uk/products/rapidpro-svt/). The UCTD winch is deployed off the stern while the ship is underway at 7-8 knots via a winch.

### Quick Links:

-   [Valeport UCTD Operating Instructions](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1id6BKzOnGaiIXUzBsbpGF7rn54h-Gky2Ws3Y4HaVMUk/edit?tab=t.0) - charging, cast methods, data download

-   [UCTD Deployment and Data Processing Procedures](https://docs.google.com/document/d/10ZPTXW3FQhb6y-FjbgErZf4UQ8RjJotSzzESQ89SWPg/edit?tab=t.0#heading=h.9wragufxa6bt) - processing data via an R Script

-   Operating Manuals and set up files can be found on the [UCTD Google Drive Folder](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1HNvgLVGcTItjX1VedqBfNyO5nVk_3XKW?usp=drive_link).
